00034 // prepare Wednus object root and attach queued objects
00035 // @todo    compare to http://developer.apple.com/internet/webcontent/iframe.html
00036 // @todo    when there is no file, 'Not Found' returns which is not valid javascript
00037 // @todo    better tag stripper
00038 (function(){
00039    // var jump = document.createElement('iframe');
00040     var jump = W.loader;
00041     jump.style.display = 'none';
00042     document.body.appendChild(jump);
00043     jump.onload = function(){run();};
00044     jump.onreadystatechange = function(){
00045         if(this.readyState == 'complete')
00046             run();
00047     };
00048 
00049     function run(){
00050         var data = jump.contentDocument?jump.contentDocument.body.innerHTML:
00051         jump.contentWindow.document.body.innerHTML;
00052         // strip off '<pre>' tag
00053         data = data.replace(/(<([^>]+)>)/ig,"");
00054         // evaluate parsed code
00055         eval(data);
00056         W.onload();
00057     };
00058 })();
